content.body: * I'm not even sure if per-store configurability (if it's a global default to push things in the call/resolve-time vs registration-time direction in the cases where both are available) will be a solution; sometimes you want the registration-time ancestor of the call-time ancestor

m.new_content.body: I'm not even sure if per-store configurability (if it's a global default to push things in the call/resolve-time vs registration-time direction in the cases where both are available) will be a solution; sometimes you want the registration-time ancestor of the call-time ancestor
